name: @prestizni-software/dem-publisher
description: An solution for when making http requests is not a good solution
author: xx0055

scripts.release: npm run release_client && npm run release_server
scripts.release_client: xcopy .\tsconfig.json ..\client\ /Y && xcopy .\AutoUpdateClientManagerClass.ts ..\client\ /Y && xcopy .\AutoUpdatedClientObjectClass.ts ..\client\ /Y && xcopy .\CommonTypes.ts ..\client\ /Y && xcopy .\AutoUpdateManagerClass.ts ..\client\ /Y && xcopy .\client.ts ..\client\ /Y && cd ..\client && npm run release && cd ..\src
scripts.release_server: xcopy .\tsconfig.json ..\server\ /Y && xcopy .\AutoUpdatedClientObjectClass.ts ..\server\ /Y && xcopy .\AutoUpdateManagerClass.ts ..\server\ /Y && xcopy .\server.ts ..\server\ /Y && xcopy .\CommonTypes.ts ..\server\ /Y && xcopy .\CommonTypes_server.ts ..\server\ /Y && xcopy .\AutoUpdateServerManagerClass.ts ..\server\ /Y && xcopy .\AutoUpdatedServerObjectClass.ts ..\server\ /Y && cd ..\server && npm run release && cd ..\src
